summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 21372, entitled, an "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Market Street from Twenty-second Avenue Northwest to Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for necessary surface drainage in all in accordance with Resolution No. 2162 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds" as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City Council of the City of Seattle," approved July 10, 1909.
